page.title: 18KINKELL BRAES-CARAVAN OWNER
page.content: The caravan park is very popular and busy during the summer months due to its advantageous position in relation to the town and beaches.One lady and her family have come here for six years running.After renting a caravan for the first few years,she bought one which is permanently there.In general she thought the facilities available in the caravan park and St Andrews were not terribly good with most things geared towards golfing.She has, however,found the facilities in the camp site have improved with the new hall and bar completed this year.She felt that children were not catered for terribly well with few entertainments.The beach is very convenient and good walks are near at hand.In general she and most caravaners are pleased with the site and area.
